articles.description: On the special occasion of her son Hridhaan Roshan's birthday, Sussanne Khan shared a sweet video featuring photos of him with her, dad Hrithik Roshan and brother Hrehaan. Sussanne also penned a heartfelt note for her son with the video.

articles.description: Chandro Tomar was already 60-plus when she picked up the gun for the first time but went on to win many national competitions, even inspiring a Bollywood movie on her.
